00016 enum { DS18B20_COUNTS_PER_DEGREE = (1 << 8) };

00019 /* Round to the nearest degree.  */
00020 #define DS18B20_TEMP_INT(TEMP) \
00021     (((TEMP) + DS18B20_COUNTS_PER_DEGREE / 2) >> DS18B20_BITS_PER_DEGREE)
00022 
00023 #define DS18B20_TEMP_DOUBLE(TEMP) \
00024         ((TEMP) / (double)DS18B20_COUNTS_PER_DEGREE + 0.5)
